name: roundabout-files
description: A simple self contained node server that facilitates data transfer through http interfaces. Can be configured for file or string transfers.

scripts.cover: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: James Salmon <k3.inquiries@gmail.com>
